body: I'm not sorry but if you read this comment, you'll have a girlfriend in the next few months. To activate this blessing, paste this in other comment sections 3 times... don't really believe in this stuff, personally, but I figured "hey, why not? couldn't hurt, at the very least."
Oh hell yeah, Charmers doujin got translated

These are from the "Charmer" archetype.
Seriously, we need more doujins based from Yu-Gi-Oh monsters aside from Dark Magician Girl, who I really hate.
finally, another leaz koubou doujin got translate... i hope the other too, especially for 291886...
They are cards from the "Charmer" archetype of the game, not from the anime but the real card game
Who tf is them??,i dont remember this character is exist in yugioh game or anime
